repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body: Add a separate macro guard "CYTHON_ASSUME_SAFE_SIZE" for calling Py*_GET_SIZE() without expecting failures.

comment_data.body: This was a bug as well.

commit.message: Add a separate macro guard "CYTHON_ASSUME_SAFE_SIZE" for calling Py*_GET_SIZE() without expecting failures.

milestone.description: Remove support for Python 2 and Python < 3.8.

title: Add separate macro guard "CYTHON_ASSUME_SAFE_SIZE"
